# PR Checklist

- [ ] Release Readiness Checklist generated and stored via `scripts/build-release-checklist.ps1` (see `docs/standards/release-readiness.md`)
- [ ] SBOM + security scan summaries attached to `docs/releases/<service>/<tag>/`
- [ ] `docs/services/<service>/spec.md`, `runbook.md`, and `README.md` updated when service code changes
- [ ] Observability goals, SLOs, and runbook notes referenced in the release artifacts
- [ ] Release notes drafted in `docs/releases/<service>/<tag>/notes.md`
- [ ] PR includes required reviewers per tier (Tier 0 + Tier 1 require platform/security sign-off)

## Summary

Describe the change and pull in any relevant links (spec, ticket, decision record, etc.).
